alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Franklin; Kearney; Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Clay, western Nuckolls, eastern Franklin, Webster, southern Adams and southeastern Kearney Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 745 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Norman to near Campbell to near Riverton. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bladen around 750 AM CDT. Holstein around 755 AM CDT. Red Cloud, Blue Hill, Roseland and Cowles around 800 AM CDT. Rosemont around 805 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ayr, Lawrence, Guide Rock, Glenvil, Deweese, Bostwick, Superior, Nelson and Fairfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Clay; Franklin; Kearney; Nuckolls; Webster
